Name: Moni
Text: Finally, we got the first part done!

Name: Ryo
Text: I got my part done too!

Name: Moni
Text: Wonderful! We did have to work extra hours but in the end it was worth it.

Name: Moni
Text: It is just, we are not even close to getting this done. Our deadline is on the 11th. Even with extra working hours that won’t be enough

Name: Moni
Text: t is already 8pm. What do we do….

Name: Ryo
Text: I was hoping we didn’t have to tell you….It’s your first day at work….

Name: Vira
Text: How about we ask the team leader for more time to finish this work?

Name: Moni
Text: Ask team leader? To give us more time?

Name: Moni
Text: Can’t we try to work more?

Name: Ryo
Text: Tell this to team leader? He sees us with great regard. What will he think of us?

Name: Moni
Text: This is such an important project. We can’t delay this.

Name: Vira
Text: If we put in our full effort, will we be able to complete our task?
